TopicTitle: What did you do in KSP1 today?

Articles.Content: Well my badly damaged rover completed its second contract half way around Mun:
I landed on Tylo with a low TWR SSTO rocket ship. I'm quite happy with it !
Made a VTOL business jet to shuttle kerbals around. Not particularly fast or fuel efficient, but she's stable across the performance envelope without using a fly-by-wire system or Mechjeb.

Today i worked on some flags for my pack:

in the pack: http://imgur.com/a/5p0Mt

Netherlands:

Brittian:

Vietnam:

Canada:

Malaysia:

America:

Texas (1stGhostLives flag)

Australia:

Free to use!! Full pack later this year.

Edited April 11, 2015 by L3GO

I revamped the entire cab section of my truck to make it look more realistic and modern. Mrs. Kerman took it out for a test drive.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Took 6 kerbals on a journey to Duna, where 3 of them stayed for 8 days on the surface at the bottom of the one larger canyons.

After the rendevouz with the TDI - TKI orbiter, they proceeded to Ike, where they currently remain before TKI maneuver.

Images from the expedition are unavailable for the moment.

Edited April 11, 2015 by Luddskij
I made a cute little minishuttle today. I took it to the Mun and back.
I sent four Kerbals to Bop. For "research." They had some trouble getting there. And they found something. Then Bad Things happened.
Kraken.

I sent four Kerbals to Bop. For "research." They had some trouble getting there. And they found something. Then Bad Things happened.

http://i.imgur.com/iwrs53W.png

Would those kerbals include a certain Edgas Kerman?

The Kraken calls....

Edited April 12, 2015 by Laythe Dweller

I haven't played since December last year bar a brief pop in. I miss Kerbal. I even have a portrait of Jebediah on my wall but I can't play it because everytime I boot my game breaks because of updates. I can't wait for v1 to drop so my life can be over and I lock myself away with this game for six months.

I got something "Landed on the Sun"

Sadly I couldn't get any science from it

Would those kerbals include a certain Edgas Kerman?

The Kraken calls....

Existentially I can say absolutely not. But also maybe.

Also, I wound up with a neat lil' family portrait of the Kerbol system. Except for Eloo & Pol, but those slackers are never around anyway.
Messed around with FASA

I finished my jumbo Jool mission gathering 41350 science points. The space station is still around Laythe, but the crew is back to Kerbin.

And I finished the Eeloo's one too, or nearly 18000 science.

I think I'll pause a while on KSP.

Kerbal Truck Simulator!

It's just like Euro Truck Simulator, only cuter.

Mrs. Kerman drives a truck carrying Jeb "Jetman" Kerman's sky-storming possessions.

I tested EladDvÃ‚Â´s K-drive, managed to turn it into kraken bait.

(K-drive is the small, glitching barrel in the back of the debris)

Edited April 12, 2015 by vitekc45c
next time try it with at least 800 m/s under it it's not very powerful it just gets stuff to about 5 m/s

I did, the dam thing woobled free of the engine section, went right through the crew section and got stuck in the hangar bay. Then it went right in the ocean with it, rest of the prototype craft got eaten by kraken.

Gues i should try it in orbit, with unhacked gravity.

Edited April 12, 2015 by vitekc45c
I worked some more on the K-Drive Program, tried to make a Differential Pressure drive and ended up with a pile of debris

I did, the dam thing woobled free of the engine section, went right through the crew section and got stuck in the hangar bay. Then it went right in the ocean with it, rest of the prototype craft got eaten by kraken.

Gues i should try it in orbit, with unhacked gravity.

yep...i heard that 22 Gs in atmo is not recommended...i tried it and it went just as well as yours (BTW was the acceleration still 22 Gs?) can you please film while trying it again?

since some stubborn engineers insist on building a spaceplane to reach orbit and several testflights with suborbital planes went pretty well, it was time to test some prototype

Edited April 12, 2015 by micr0wave

I made a flying boat with that looks quite similar to the PBY Catalina of WWII fame. It handles well, but gets hard to control in pitch at full throttle; landing and takeoff characteristics are very benign.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
I covered Minmus in probes!!

I wanted to lift my (over-engineered) duna outpost into LKO in a cheap way in career mode, ended up all-solid :

Short orbital refueling and to Duna we go !

After arriving at Duna i realized it was so overkill it was the good time to hop on Ike on the way to duna, land, and back up to orbit, thus accomplishing 2 contracts at once instead of the planned one only

Finally, i put up a basic Mun base in one go, because i felt too lazy to assemble it on the ground or in orbit, i instead used a huge rocket (no pics :/ ) to lift it ! As you can see its pretty much a bunch of spacetape linked together with modules There are also a couple escape pods (that can make it only to Kerbin)
